divs: Sighting Detailsi have not even seen just a small amount of UFOs but every time its different i am always amassed every time . i see it often the same one its round shape the size a one man or two man craft.i feel that i am connecd to the craft somehow i don't know. i feel that some how there not leaving me alone .i feel i have two probes in me so when they are around i can feel them
